channel.title: Portfolio of Work
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio of Work

item.title: Beam Current Transformer Calibration System
item.description: Full system FPGA based controller card 2 x Analogue Precision Pulsed Current Source PSU distribution card Calibrator Controller 4 layer board 24 bit 4 MSPS sigma delta ADC EEPROM Voltage monitoring 4 x Opto-coupled LEMO inputs 2 x 10 GPIO with 3 pins dedicated to 3V3 for I2C etc. USB to QSPI bridge Analogue Precision Pulsed Current Source 6 layer board Precision current source - 12ppm stability to 3 standard deviations.

item.title: 220/80 MHZ Distribution Amplifier
item.description: Features Modular design Configurable to support single or dual inputs Configurable non reflective filters 4 output channels 1 user channel (no filter) Impedance controlled to 50 ohms Configurable power supply voltages to first and second stage amplifiers in main output channels Bypassable amplifier stages Full System

item.title: 320MHz Head Amplifier
item.description: Features Dual channel amplifier 400 MHz non-reflective input filter 50 Ohm system Radiation tolerant PSU 4 layer board

item.title: VME Motor Controller
item.description: Features FPGA controller Control upto 8 motors For use with VME 6 layer board

item.title: VME USB Rear Transition Module
item.description: Features USB power controller Single ended 45 Ohms, differential 90 Ohm lines 3 x USB outputs For use with VME backplane
